scripts.dev:full: npm run cleanup:force && npm run port-setup && npx concurrently -n WEB,API,WORKER,POST,SYN,MANUAL -c auto --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 3 "npm:dev" "npm:api" "npm:worker:auto" "npm:postprocess" "npm:synthetic:auto" "npm:manual-upload"
scripts.start:fresh: npm run cleanup:complete && npm run port-setup && npx concurrently -n WEB,API,WORKER,POST,SYN,MANUAL -c auto --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 3 "npm:dev" "npm:api" "npm:worker:auto" "npm:postprocess" "npm:synthetic:auto" "npm:manual-upload"
scripts.start:force: npm run cleanup:force && npm run port-setup && npx concurrently -n WEB,API,WORKER,POST,SYN,MANUAL -c auto --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 3 "npm:dev" "npm:api" "npm:worker:auto" "npm:postprocess" "npm:synthetic:auto" "npm:manual-upload"
